channel.description: Do The Work Credit Nathan Bean's CIS 400 https://people.cs.ksu.edu/~nhbean/cis400/a-learning-programming/ The person doing the work is the person doing the learning. - Various Educators Myth Some people are just natural born programmers, and others simply cannot learn to program. Programming is writing steps to solve problems in a way that a computer can perform those steps We must learn to express steps with exactitude and precision and understand how a computer functions to be able to program
